channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Multiple potholes for a small stretch of road both in the center of road and my the curb on the left hand side of the road as if your driving away from the racecourse with many vehicles having to drive into the middle of the road to try and avoid these serious potholes, 27th February
item.description:
Driving away from the race course inbetween the main round about and the roundabout where you can turn into Tommy Taylorâ€™s lane which also has a serious pothole. Main ones are just before paddocks lane
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Swindon Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several Pot Holes, especially around the speed bump, 27th February
item.description:
Several Pot holes in this area. Speed bump to protect school children has deteriorated. I have seen this issue has been reported, with the assessment stating that it does not meet the requirements of an urgent repair. However, it should be taken into account that the community have raised this issue on several occasions. It is a busy road used to transport children to and from school. Please reassess as this road has deteriorated rapidly through poor weather conditions.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malvern Road, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 27th February
item.description:
Contact AHR. Jetter needed.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The beginning of a much deeper issue., 27th February
item.description:
Outside no 1, Foxwell Drive Hucclecote Gloucester GL3 3LF Potentially a dangerous pot hole.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Foxwell Drive, Hucclecote, Gloucester

item.title: Huge drain issue when driving, 27th February
item.description:
When raining, even if a small shower the drain doesnt go down properly. To the point have to drive closer to the other side of the road to avoid spraying pedestrians and also flooding car.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Folly Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drains, 27th February
item.description:
This is in the cul-de-sac of Hitchlands drive, both drains are blocked, the first one is outside of 1 Hitchlands drive and the other is between 02-03 Hitchlands drive, this has been like this now for about 2 years but when call the council they never want to know.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Hitchlands Drive, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unmarked pothole, 27th February
item.description:
Ive missed this pothole several times as not obvious but been a big noise in car when going over. Its unsafe as not obvious. Its as your coming up to the lights in the right hand lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swindon Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
